shows.title: Dark Secrets of Sports / Templar Treasures & Mysteries
shows.first_half: First Half: Leading expert on game fixing, Brian Tuohy, will discuss all of the secrets and dirty truths that the sports leagues don't want the public to know. Tuohy is recognized as a scholarly authority by the United States Supreme Court and believes the professional sports industry is lacking in oversight.
shows.second_half: Second Half: TV and radio presenter Lionel Fanthorpe will describe his work as an Anglican Priest, as well as share stories about the world's most mysterious castles and murders, mysteries of Templar treasure, and more.

shows.title: The Social Brain / Astrological Cycles & Personal Growth
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Bruce Miller, a distinguished professor of neurology, will bring us his latest research into the mysteries of the social brain, how neural circuits shape empathy, morality, and connection, and what happens when they break down in conditions like Alzheimer’s disease and dementia.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Astrologer and paranormal researcher Jeff Harman will discuss the world's response to major astrological cycles, as well as the role astrology plays in our personal growth. Harman firmly believes our consciousness intertwines with astrology and the evolution of our souls.

shows.title: Biblical Prophecy & Archaeology / Holographic Simulation Theory
shows.first_half: First Half: Pastor and teacher Mondo Gonzales will explore the topics of Bible prophecy, Biblical archaeology, the prophetic importance of the Red Heifer, and Jewish Rabbis found in the Bible.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ufologist, filmmaker, and stuntman Reuben Langdon will discuss the theory that we might be living in a holographic simulation created by a higher intelligence, one that's either extraterrestrial or extra-dimensional. He'll also relate his experience connecting with these beings and his interviews with contactees.

shows.title: Wonders of the Universe / Unearthly Experiences
shows.first_half: First Half: Astrophysicist Charles Liu will bring us some of the latest and most fascinating scientific discoveries about the universe, cosmology, galaxies, stars, our solar system, and the frontiers of human and non-human life.
shows.second_half: Second Half: C2C's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones presents her interview with author Clint Deloatch, who uncovers true stories of people's unearthly experiences. He brings to life the unheard stories of people who have seen the unseen, and delves into hidden truths about our existence, the presence of a Creator, and the mysterious beings that we share our universe with.

shows.title: Healthcare & Spirituality / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Guest host Connie Willis (info) will speak with Dr. Brad Stuart, a distinguished figure in the field of end-of-life care, about practical insights that transcend the boundaries of healthcare and spirituality. Stuart is an author and psychedelics expert who guides others on extraordinary journeys that unravel the mysteries of existence. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
